p:
The SFA, MUFA and PUFA contents of these fried food samples was estimated via integration of ISBs featuring their acylglycerol bis-allylic-C H 2-, -C H 2-CH = CH- and α-C H 2-CO 2- function resonances (δ = 2.73–2.88, 1.96–2.13 and 2.26–2.37 ppm respectively), i.e. an adaption of the method described in
9 .
